doc:
Noam Pitlik https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Noam_Pitlik 0 Noam Pitlik (November 4, 1932 – February 18, 1999) was an American television director and actor. In 1979, Pitlik won an Emmy for Outstanding Directing for a Comedy Series for his work on the ABC sitcom Barney Miller. Noam_Pitlik ( November_4_,_1932 – February_18_,_1999 ) was an_American_television_director_and_actor . In 1979 , Pitlik won an_Emmy for Outstanding_Directing for a_Comedy_Series for his_work on the_ABC_sitcom_Barney_Miller .
